backend/main.mo: Defines the canister with service and booking types, in‑memory maps, and CRUD-like methods for services and booking requests.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration that adds a predefined Cancer Care service and updates nextServiceId.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of key frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup with custom OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and wraps pages in AppLayout.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout component with header, navigation, mobile menu, and Internet Identity login handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a typed backend actor, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching services, individual service, creating bookings, and fetching user bookings.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, including color tokens and base typography styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/Booking.tsx: Implements a booking form with validation, locality selection, and Internet Identity login flow before submitting booking requests.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Displays the homepage with a hero section, feature highlights, and navigation buttons for services and bookings.
frontend/src/pages/MyBookings.tsx: Shows a logged‑in user's booking list with loading states, login prompts, and status badges.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetails.tsx: Loads and displays details for a single service with coverage areas, descriptions, and a booking button.
frontend/src/pages/Services.tsx: Displays a searchable services list with optional locality filtering and navigation to service detail pages.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended theme colors, fonts, animations, and includes typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current state, including features, pending requests, metadata, and known issues for a Chennai-focused home healthcare app.
